original_text: let him know that whoever brings back a sinner from his wandering will save his soul from death and will cover a multitude of sins.
korean_text: 너희가 알 것은 죄인을 미혹된 길에서 돌아서게 하는 자가 그의 영혼을 사망에서 구원할 것이며 허다한 죄를 덮을 것임이라

sentences.original_text: whoever brings back a sinner from his wandering
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 길을 잃은 죄인을 돌아오게 하는 자는

sentences.original_text: will save his soul from death
and will cover a multitude of sins.
